title: Mahoutsukai Ni Tadaima
alternative_title: 魔法使いにただいま ; I'm Home to My Wizard ; Mahoutsukai ni Tadaima
status: 魔法使いにただいま ; I'm Home to My Wizard ; Mahoutsukai ni Tadaima
description:
Description :
        In a world where marriage between wizards and humans is allowed, Kagami Kippei (32), an elementary school teacher, and Lily (about 300 years old), a wizard, have recently gotten married! Although the pace of human and wizard life is sometimes a little different, they enjoy eating delicious meals together, making out on the couch, and making up as quickly as possible when they have small fights. This is a home love comedy with a blend of gentleness and a touch of fun!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: The Person At Home With A Cute Smile
Vol.1 Chapter 1: Kagami Sensei's Special Class
